# Primes

## `primes`

Grouped primes.

```example
$ a'''_b = a^'''_b $
```

# Syntax
This function has dedicated syntax: use apostrophes instead of primes. They
will automatically attach to the previous element, moving superscripts to
the next level.

## Parameters

### count *(required)*

The number of grouped primes.

## Returns

- content
